segments.text: It ’ s going to a volleyball match between the economic department and foreign language department this afternoon . Are any of you keen on volleyball ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I ’ m not a volleyball-fun . I ’ d rather play football . How about you , Mr . Wang . ? Are you interested in volleyball ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m afraid not . My favorite is boots-running . I don ’ t care about games .
segments.speaker: S1
